raw akas.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal

akas: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (original title)
akas from release info: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (original title)

1.title: Banishing Evil

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: 12-year-old Nick is tormented by an evil spirit named Mr. Rosenberg. Since Rosenberg entered his life, Nick has been plagued by violent nightmares and physical attacks. He lives in constant fear and his only desire is to be a normal kid. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Nick to Anissa, an 11-year-old girl who is so frightened by the ghosts and spirits that surround her that she hasn't been able to sleep alone for as long as she can remember. Nick and Anissa work to develop the strength and confidence to keep evil entities at bay, and ...

2.title: Psychic Kids Investigates: The Lost Girl

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Brad is an 18-year-old boy who is tormented by evil spirits and dark premonitions that have come true. Brad's parents believe he is being summoned by the devil and refuse to support his abilities. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Brad to 15-year-old Santana, who is traumatized by her ability to see past events through her sense of touch. Both kids want to overcome their fears and use their psychic abilities to help people. They get the chance to participate in a missing person investigation and try to find a teenage girl from Florida who ...

3.title: Bloody Maryland

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Alana is a 13-year-old medical intuitive who is haunted by spirits wherever she goes. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce her to Olivia, a 16-year-old girl who is petrified by the spirits that come to her at night. The girls meet in Maryland to face their fears, but while exploring the Landon House, site of Civil War deaths, they are overwhelmed by negative spirits. They leave that night and stay at another inn, where they work on managing their abilities and help a woman who longs to contact her dead children. Ultimately though, they must ...

4.title: Psychic Kids Investigates: The Disappearance

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: 15-year-old Alex has suffered physical attacks by negative spirits that have sent him to the emergency room. Sensitive Chris Fleming and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Alex to 17-year-old Jennifer who is plagued by the spirits she sees daily. She's unable to share her deep fears with her family, which makes her feel isolated. Both kids long to control their abilities and use them in a positive way. They get the chance when they join local authorities in a missing person investigation, gathering psychic information about a teenage boy who walked away from a park in ...

5.title: The House of Spirits

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: 12-year-old Olivia is terrified by the dark spirits that haunt her home. She believes that her house is a portal for evil spirits, but has no idea that her parents have kept a secret about the house from her. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Olivia to 11-year-old Amy who communicates with the spirits of her ancestors. Amy is too scared to sleep without her mother, which has created upheaval in her family. With Chip and Edy's guidance, both girls work to fight their fear and hone their psychic skills. They'll need all their abilities to ...

6.title: Messages from the Dead: The Lizzie Borden Case

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Megan is a 15-year-old girl who receives messages from the dead but is terrified to deliver them to the loved ones of the spirits who speak to her. Sensitive Chris Fleming and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Megan to 17-year-old Brittany, who is dealing with the physical illness she feels from encountering spirits. Psychic/Medium Kim Russo joins in to teach the girls about receiving messages from beyond. Ultimately Megan and Brittany travel to Lizzie Borden's house, the site of two murders. There, Megan has to face her fear of delivering messages and see if she can ...

7.title: Psychic Kids Investigates: The Lost Soul

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Nicole is a 17-year-old girl who communicates with spirits and is traumatized by them. She says the spirits want something from her but she doesn't know what that is. Ryan is a 16-year-old boy who has premonitions of tragic events and knows details about people without having met them. Sensitive Chris Fleming and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Nicole and Ryan to a psychic teenager they've worked with before. Since appearing on Psychic Kids Vicki has been using her abilities to help the police in her hometown. With Vicki as a mentor, these teens apply their psychic ...

1.title: The Ghost of Freddie

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Ahli, Faith, and Jillian are girls with psychic abilities. Along with their moms, the girls are brought to an old house to have their psychic abilities confirmed by a medium and child psychologist, as well as an experienced aura reader.

2.title: Fear Management

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Joel and siblings Morgan and Brad are brought to a ranch to learn how to cope with and understand their psychic abilities with the help of Chip Coffey. Their parents are counseled by Dr. Lisa Miller.

3.title: The Demon House

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Hailey (12) and Alexa (14) face their fears concerning dark spirits. They are taken to Alex's abandoned home to face a demonic spirit with demonologists Roberts and Isbell and psychic Coffey. Dr. Miller counsels the girls and their mothers.

4.title: Night Terrors

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: ReAnna Kelly is an 8-year-old girl who is visited by numerous spirits, including that of her grandmother, the late jazz singer Nina Simone. More troubling, ReAnna also sees the entity of a young girl who she thinks died in an auto accident in front of her home. ReAnna's so frightened that she cannot sleep through the night.

5.title: Angels and Demons

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Ashley is a 13 year-old Wisconsin girl who sees horned evil spirits everywhere she goes. One of the spirits told her she was going to die in a car accident, and she continues to live petrified of her own premonition. Chip and Lisa introduce her to Dalton, a 15 year-old boy who correctly predicted the location of a missing person in his hometown

6.title: The Missing Person

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Veronica is a 15-year-old girl who dreamed of her uncle's death the night before he was murdered. The spirit of that uncle continues to haunt her, and Veronica continually struggles with not only her experiences, but also her father's skepticism. Chip and Lisa introduce Veronica to Travis and Nicole, two other teens who both wrestle with their psychic abilities.

1.title: Vanished

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Teens, Travis and Vicki, team up with a professional private investigator on a real world missing persons case. Their psychic hits shed new light and hope on the case.

2.title: Family Secrets

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Mother and daughter psychics, Caprice and Jordi, along with two teen psychic sisters, Peyton and Riley, attempt to solve the puzzle of a mysterious girl ghost at an inn dating to the revolutionary war.

3.title: Ghost School

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: 13-year-olds, Bryson and Colt, join a paranormal investigation of a century-old haunted opera house. The boys struggle to be accepted by their dads who doubt their abilities.

4.title: Crossing Over

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Three pre-teens, Hannah, Savanah, and Shauniece team up to help a woman contact her deceased father. Along the way each girl discovers new psychic talents they never knew they had.

5.title: Demon in the Mirror

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Tammy, 15-years-old, along with the help of Alexandra, 17-years-old, must face the "Lady in the Mirror" a spirit that torments her virtually every night.

6.title: Haunted Attic

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Peri and Devon, two teens, explore a haunted whaling ship in order to overcome their fears of encountering spirits.

7.title: Night Terrors

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Coffey and Nathan help two teenage girls face their fears of the spirits they see and build their confidence in the psychic abilities they possess. Nathan also counsels the girls' mothers on the three-day retreat to an historical building.

8.title: Spirits Among Us

episode of.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Social outcasts, Olivia and Hailey, discover friendship and the power to overcome their fears of the paranormal. A startling discovery validates both Hailey's and Olivia's abilities to see spirits.

imdb.title: Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal
plot: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and clinical psychologist/director Dr. Lisa Miller help psychic children and their families cope, validate, empower and understand psychic abilities.::ley-moon
